articles.title: Lia Capper
articles.contents:
Lia Capper
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Curriculum Vitae
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Summary
            Ambitious student working to complete a Bachelor of Science with Honours at the end of 2021. Skilled in statistics, mathematics, and psychological research methods, with great communication skills. Adaptable and driven with strong work ethic and ability to thrive in team-based or individually motivated settings. Currently hold a full New Zealand driver’s license and own a car.
            
            
            Skills
            Strong mathematical aptitude.
            Data gathering and organization.
            Experience with statistical software such as JAMOVI, SPSS, and Excel.
            Proficient in the Microsoft Suite
            Communication skills, including written.
            Enthusiastic.
            Fast learner.
            Works well in a team, with strong leadership skills when needed.
            Decision making skills.
            Currently hold a full New Zealand drivers licence and own a car.
            
            
            Education and Training
            Victoria University of Wellington
                   2018-2020: Bachelor of Science Double Majoring in Mathematics and Psychology.
                   2021-Current: Bachelor of Science with Honours Majoring in Psychology.
            
            Hagley College
                   2013-2017: High School Diploma.
            
            
            Experience
            NumberWorks’nWords Kilbirnie
            Math Tutor, 2018-Current 
            Instruct students and support understanding of math concepts.
            Deliver effective math tutoring for students from year 1 through to year 13.
            Contribute to the organisation and planning of the individualised lessons.
            Support students in achieving their goals in NCEA, whether that be passing or achieving with excellence
            
            Honey Café
            Barista, 2016-2018
            Prepared and served hot and cold beverages such as coffee, espresso drinks, blended coffees, and teas.
            Managed weekend lunch rush with efficient, level-headed customer service.
            Received and accurately processed customer payments.
            
            PMP Distributors
            Paper Deliverer, 2013-2014
            Folded and delivered pamphlets, the newspaper, etc. three times a week.
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Lia Capper
